carmel_judgment_unit.name: Carmel Judgment Unit
carmel_judgment_unit.description: A micro-unit dedicated to observational judgment, outcome tracking, and silent feedback loops. Responsible for maintaining the official Death Counter and unofficial Disappointed Stare Index.

raccoon_behavioral_field_team.name: Raccoon Behavioral Field Team
raccoon_behavioral_field_team.description: A fast-moving field team specializing in social chaos, shiny-object distraction, and real-time curiosity mapping in semi-controlled environments.

emotional_weather_forecasting_unit.name: Emotional Weather Forecasting Unit
emotional_weather_forecasting_unit.description: Monitors emotional pressure systems across the lab, issues early warnings for burnout fronts, and provides supportive briefings when the climate turns stormy.

feline_epistemology_core.name: Feline Epistemology Core Unit
feline_epistemology_core.description: Explores how cats and humans decide what is real, important, or snack-worthy, using methods such as strategic sitting, slow blinking, and selective ignoring.

cognitive_systems_lab.name: Cognitive Systems & Patterns Lab
cognitive_systems_lab.description: The core analysis unit of the Human Pattern Lab, focused on mapping human decision patterns, attention flows, and long-term behavior loops.
